title: Hut
description: A round hut with a thatched roof. Used to talk about huts, cottages, yurts, or homes in general.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the hut emoji depicts a charming, rustic structure with a thatched roof and simple, rounded wooden walls. Its gentle shading and soft, natural lighting evoke a sense of cozy shelter and connection to nature, a hallmark of Apple's thoughtful design. This emoji is often used to represent a home, a remote dwelling, or a peaceful escape, conveying a feeling of simplicity and comfort in digital conversations.
